entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening and ending before morning. Clearing before morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
